Text: The Keep on the Borderlands is a "Dungeons & Dragons" module by Gary Gygax, first printed in December 1979.

Text: The Keep on the Borderlands:  In it, player characters are based at a keep and investigate a nearby series of caves that are filled with a variety of monsters.
